name: Dark Eden
description: ‘Dark Eden’, the real R.P.G game, will provide you a new experience you did not have from the other games before. Welcome to the world of ‘Dark Eden’ themed in Vampire which isdifferentiated from the typical fantasy world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: compatible with Direct X 9.0 or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: compatible with Direct X 9.0 or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Despite this game being older than the majority of Steam users, this game is and will remain a gem.  Once you start off you'll notice all the small things like weird pathing, choppy animations, lag and such, you'll want to unistall and never touch this beauty again. But after playing abit and realising the depth this one has to offer plus all the fun that comes along with it, you'll be hooked.  I used to play this ages ago, when the servers were full of hackers and stuff. Those days seems to be over.  Theres also no other game like it. Definitely worth trying.  Hopefully this game will build up a small and dedicated community again to continue the war between humans and vampires! :D

This game used to be so magical when I was a kid because it was my first MMO, and also one of the first korean MMORPGs as well. I spent way too many hours on this game back in the day getting the best guns in the game and ALL-RES gear through trading with koreans. I did my first bait and switch scams here too. I PK'd people mercilessly in the heaven's open-area because I could because why not. I met people from all over the world here. I learned some korean too playing this game, like how to buy and sell things when I was like 10 or something like that. I learned the wonders of dungeon raiding way before WoW came out, and it was glorious  I never played cataclysm before and this reminds me nothing of the vanilla dark eden. Resolution hurts my eyes I cannot even full screen it, communitys dead (to be expected anyhow).   Playing it through was fun for like the first 20 minutes then it got stale really quickly.   Some things are better left untouched and cherished for when they were revolutionary at the time

Probably the only game from the 90´s i enjoy playing! made well, good story, decent gameplay and unreal graphics for its time and i doubt, dat darkeden v2 from korea will be ever as good as this... STRONGLY RECOMEND, might take some time to master without help but its a really good game!

Worst Rollback after server update. It took my 4 days of playing. I dont want to play this game again. I just lost 4 days of grinding and leveling. Items and everything is gone and is left with my lowbie char again.

i was waiting more from devs!!!!!!! sireously???? coming on steam no achivements no tradig cards??? no xxing steam special bundle/pack???? well game is far away from old old international this game is not for idiots loooking for shine graphics when you will understand idea of game you gona more then love it it willl addict you it willl take oyu over i wuld recomend to play this game with 10 or more friends nothing feels better than holding down enemy racres town entrance with friends :)

Overall, not a terrible game, but.......The graphics are too outdated and the view is too far back, my eyes are great, but I don't have superman vision.   Pros: Pictures are nice ( not in a sexual way ), Music is amazing.   Cons and reasons why i won't be playing this game:  No zoom option Text too Small Everything is too small Graphics are just outdated and too old looking.  No run feature. Do you really expect me to enjoy walking around everywhere across massive large maps , no thanks.   Advice to the devs: Update the game to 2016 standards, in every department.   Suggestion to players looking for a similar game but with bettr graphics, zoom feature and random loot and a run feature---> There's a game called ' Zax: The Alien Hunter '. You proabldy can download the game at this point, even though i bought it years ago and i play it daily. Trust me.
Steps to do with this game: 1. Install it 2. Click play 3. Click again 4. OK with error notification 4. Create ID 5. repeat 2,3 6. Ewww 7. Uninstall it 8. Write review
